file_content.text: Are you the Sith they call the Great Healer? The one they say has his eye on Lord Paladius's cult?
Are you the Sith they call the Great Dragon? The one they say has his eye on Lord Paladius's cult?
If you mean the future leader of Lord Paladius's cult, then yes.
That's me.
Good. I would have hated to kill you and then find out you were the wrong person.
I don't believe we've met.
Who are you?
Gar-Nok, honored of Lord Paladius.
Why should I tell you?
I just wanted to make sure I had the right person before I kill you.
Why do so many people think they can oppose my master? They all end up the same way.
Perhaps you'll provide a challenge. With most of these whelps, it's over too quickly.
I'll send your body back to your master in pieces.
This will be fun.
Bark all you like, Sith, it won't make you one of the big dogs.
How did you find this place?
You shouldn't be here.
There are still people on the streets who are loyal to my master, and your followers do an awful lot of talking.
I'll try not to disappoint.
Don't worry.
I don't know what it is you Sith believe, but maybe you'll find someone on the other side to explain it to you.
Now let's not make this too quick, shall we?
